de.wwu.muggl.vm.impl.real
Class RealVirtualMachine

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Thread
      de.wwu.muggl.vm.VirtualMachine
          de.wwu.muggl.vm.impl.real.RealVirtualMachine
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class RealVirtualMachine
extends VirtualMachine

This concrete class represents a virtual machine for the "normal" execution of java bytecode. It inherits methods from the abstract implementation, providing some additional methods as well as overriding others.

Version:
1.0.0, 2008-11-10
Author:
Tim Majchrzak

Constructor Detail

RealVirtualMachine

public RealVirtualMachine(Application application,
                          MugglClassLoader classLoader,
                          ClassFile classFile,
                          Method initialMethod)
                   throws InitializationException
Basic constructor. It initializes the stack to a "normal" Stack instance.

Parameters:
application - The application this virtual machine is used by.
classLoader - The main classLoader to use.
classFile - The classFile to start execution with.
initialMethod - The Method to start execution with. This Method has to be a method of the supplied classFile.
Throws:
InitializationException - If initialization of auxiliary classes fails.

executeInstruction

protected void executeInstruction(Instruction instruction)
                           throws ExecutionException
This concrete method executes the given instruction.

Specified by:
executeInstruction in class VirtualMachine
Parameters:
instruction - The instruction that is to be executed.
Throws:
ExecutionException - An exception is thrown on any fatal errors during execution.
